Hero.title: Software Engineer
Hero.stack: NestJs | ReactJs | React-Query | NodeJs | ExpressJs | MongoDB | PostgreSQL | Jest
Hero.description: I am a Software Engineer with track record of designing and implementing scalable, efficient, and user-centric solutions. With hands-on experience in NestJS, React.js, and modern development practices like Test-Driven Development (TDD), I excel in building robust backend systems, intuitive front-end interfaces, and efficient automation workflows. Letâ€™s connect to discuss technology, collaboration, or exciting opportunities in software development!

Projects.name: ColComm
Projects.description: Created a chat platform to connect mentees and mentors based on specific fields of expertise and skills. Implemented AI-based content moderation by using FastText with Random Forest algorithms to filter out hate speech and abusive content, achieving 94% accuracy.

Projects.name: Hotels.com
Projects.description: Built a scalable hotel booking platform using NestJS, enabling users to search hotels by location, book rooms, list hotels, and update property details. Optimized backend APIs for handling complex queries by using asynchronous processing, indexing, and optimized database queries, ensuring efficient data retrieval and smooth performance even under high traffic loads.

Projects.name: Serverless Medium
Projects.description: Built a serverless blogging platform using Cloudflare Workers and Hono for scalability. Utilized Prisma ORM with Prisma Accelerate for efficient connection pooling. Enabled type-safe data sharing via an NPM package. Implemented secure authentication with access and refresh tokens and used Zod for data validation.

Projects.name: ImpactNGO
Projects.description: Built a web application to address the problem of people and restaurents and other stores who have leftover or extra food, clothes or other

description: Resolved numerous bugs and customer issues, decreasing support tickets by 40% and significantly improving customer satisfaction.
Introduced Time-To-Live (TTL) functionality in the database schema and automated the deletion of expired data using a cron job script with BullMQ, reducing database size by 7.3%.
Enhanced the reliability of automation workflows by integrating retry mechanisms, reducing average incident resolution time by 30% during high-traffic hours.
Developed and optimized multiple RESTful APIs adhering to Test-Driven Development (TDD) principles, improving code quality and reducing bugs in production.
Engineered a robust entry translation functionality for multilingual content, enabling translation into any desired language while effectively handling edge cases.
Designed and implemented a UI skeleton and chat interface for AI agents, integrating state management techniques to handle dynamic interactions and complex workflows.
Developed several triggers and actions for automation workflows which are used by the customers to automate their workflows.
Implemented server-side validations for users and inputs to enhance security and prevent escalations.

Implemented publish/unpublish functionalities in the workflow. So that user can publish or unpublish any component from the workflow at any given time without deleting the component from the workflow.
Create tests for the implemented features using Jest and Playwright
Collaborated in a team to develop TechX, the company's internal website.

Education.degree: B.E in Information Science and Engineering
